item.title: Energy Resources Analyst - Upwork
item.description:
How will your workday look?
- You will create analytical tables;
- Conduct electricity accounting;
- Analyze data using various programs and be responsible for transferring data to a new analytics program;
- Create and manage tools for predictive maintenance;
- Automate the metrological verification system;
- Develop new tools (e.g., macro files) and improve existing analytical tools.

This position is perfect for you if:
- You have a higher education (a technical background is an advantage);
- You are proficient in using MS Excel;
- You have experience with Power BI and Qlik Sense analytics tools;
- You are skilled in using the English language.

In this position, the following will be useful:
- Experience in seeking new innovative solutions;
- Experience in implementing new analytical tools in a company.

Design, build, and customize applications and workflows using Power Apps, Power Automate, Power BI, and Power Virtual Agents.
Integrate Power Platform solutions with various data sources, including SharePoint, Dynamics 365, SQL Server, and external APIs.
Create user-friendly interfaces and ensure a seamless user experience.

Provide technical support and troubleshooting for Power Platform solutions.

Maintain detailed documentation of the solutions, including design, configuration, and user guides.

Minimum 4 years of experience working with Microsoft Power Platform, including Power Apps, Power Automate, Power BI, and Power Virtual Agents.
Strong proficiency in creating canvas and model-driven Power Apps, designing Power Automate workflows, developing Power BI dashboards, and configuring Power Virtual Agents.
Proficiency in languages such as JavaScript, TypeScript, and Power Fx.
Experience with data integration, data modeling, and working with various data sources.
Strong problem-solving and analytical skills to troubleshoot issues and optimize solutions.
Excellent verbal and written communication skills to effectively collaborate with team members and stakeholders.

item.title: Develop Comprehensive Sales and Inventory Analytics Dashboard - Upwork
item.description:
We're looking for a skilled data analyst to create a robust analytics dashboard focusing on sales and inventory data. The ideal candidate will have strong experience in data visualization and business intelligence tools.

# Key Features:

Interactive dashboard showcasing:

- Sales trends and forecasts
- Inventory levels and turnover rates
- Product performance metrics
- Customer segmentation analysis
- Real-time data integration and automated updates

# Technical Requirements:

- Proficiency in data visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI, or similar)
- Strong SQL skills for data manipulation and querying
- Experience with ETL processes
- Knowledge of statistical analysis and forecasting techniques
- Familiarity with cloud-based data warehousing solutions

# Deliverables:
- Fully functional, interactive dashboard
- Documentation for dashboard usage and maintenance
- Data pipeline for automated updates
- Report on key insights and recommendations
  
# Please include in your proposal:

- Your experience with similar projects in sales and inventory analytics
- Proposed tools and technologies
- Estimated timeline and milestones
- Sample visualizations from previous work

Best,
Rohit!

item.title: Reports Analyst - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a detail-oriented and analytical Reports Analyst to join our team. In this role, you will be responsible for collecting, analyzing, and reporting data to help drive informed business decisions. You will work closely with various departments to understand their data needs and provide accurate and actionable insights.

Key Responsibilities:

• Collect and analyze data from various sources to generate reports
   and dashboards.
• Design, develop, and maintain reporting systems to support
   business operations.
• Interpret data, analyze results, and provide insights to
   management and other stakeholders.
• Create and distribute regular reports, ensuring accuracy and
   timeliness.
• Identify trends, patterns, and anomalies in data to support
   strategic planning and decision-making.
• Collaborate with different departments to understand their data
   requirements and deliver customized reports.
• Ensure data integrity and consistency across all reports.
• Continuously improve reporting processes and tools to enhance
   efficiency and effectiveness.
• Provide training and support to end-users on reporting tools and
   data interpretation.

Qualifications:

• Previous experience in a data analysis or reporting role.
• Proficiency in using data analysis and reporting tools (e.g., SQL,
   Excel, Tableau, Power BI, Freshworks Analytics).
• Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
• Excellent attention to detail and a high degree of accuracy.
• Ability to translate complex data into clear and actionable insights.
• Strong communication skills, both written and verbal.
• Ability to manage multiple tasks and meet deadlines in a fast-
   paced environment.
• Knowledge of database management and data warehousing
   concepts.

Hourly Range: $7.00-$10.00

Category: Data Analytics
Skills:Operations Analytics, Customer Service Analytics, Product Analytics, Data Analytics, Data Interpretation, Data Analysis, Microsoft Excel, Analytics, Data Visualization, Business Intelligence

• Experience with coding and Python query research.
• Willingness to visit data centre and manage feed connectivity.
***

item.title: Microsoft Power App Designer and Developer - Upwork
item.description:
Health & Safety is a fundamental commitment at Alimak Group, with a robust sustainability strategy with clear high-level policies, objectives and zero harm vision. Based on that, we are aiming to implement a Power App to enhance health and safety management, driving a positive safety culture and effectively manage our proactive and reactive safety approach. This solution / app will allow employees to quickly and easily record “one-off” safety observations, near-miss events, property damage events, and various types of injuries, using their smartphone, tablet or computer.

We are looking for a talented and experienced professional to design and develop this custom application. The app needs to integrate with Microsoft Lists and Power BI to develop analytics and reporting features. The responsibilities will include the following:
• Design and develop interactive prototypes and user interfaces for a user-friendly Health and Safety app.
• Build and customize a Health and Safety app using Microsoft Power Apps, ensuring seamless integration with Microsoft Lists and other Microsoft 365 tools.
• Implement multi-language support for the app, including English, German, French, and Spanish.
• Create and manage site-specific features within the app using Microsoft Lists to cater to various locations and managers.
• Utilize Power BI to develop advanced analytics and reporting capabilities, offering both global and location-specific dashboards.
• Conduct thorough unit testing and work closely with the team to ensure the app's reliability and robustness.
• Provide support for user adoption and ongoing maintenance of the app.

Hourly Range: $19.00-$40.00
Posted On: July 18, 2024 06:59 UTC
Category: Mobile App Development
Skills:Microsoft PowerApps, Data Visualization, Microsoft Power BI Development, UX & UI Design
Skills: Microsoft PowerApps, Data Visualization, Microsoft Power BI Development, UX & UI Design
Country: Spain
click to apply

Job Title: MS Power Flow Expert - SharePoint Integration

Job Description:

We are looking for an experienced MS Power Flow Expert to assist in automating the updating of SharePoint lists from Excel files. This role requires expertise in Microsoft Power Automate (formerly Flow) and SharePoint Online integration. You will play a crucial role in streamlining data management processes within our organization.

Responsibilities:

Develop Microsoft Power Automate workflows to automate the process of updating SharePoint lists from Excel files.
Customize and configure SharePoint Online lists and libraries to optimize data storage and retrieval.
Ensure data integrity and accuracy during the migration and updating process.
Collaborate with stakeholders to gather requirements and design efficient solutions.
Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to SharePoint list updates and data synchronization.
Provide technical support and guidance to end-users on using SharePoint lists effectively.

Requirements:

Proven experience in developing workflows using Microsoft Power Automate (Flow).
Strong proficiency in Microsoft SharePoint Online administration and customization.
Expertise in integrating and manipulating data between Excel and SharePoint.
Familiarity with SharePoint list architecture, metadata management, and permissions.
Ability to analyze business requirements and translate them into technical solutions.
Excellent communication skills and ability to work collaboratively in a remote environment.

Duration: Flexible, based on project scope and timeline.

Location: Remote

How to Apply:

Interested candidates should submit a proposal detailing their experience with Microsoft Power Automate, SharePoint Online integration, and examples of previous projects related to Excel-SharePoint data synchronization. Please include your availability and solution price in the proposal.

item.title: Power BI Expert| Data Modeling| Senior Data Analyst - FULL TIME - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for an analyst on a part-time/full-time basis who can work a minimum of 30 (can do over 60 if good fit) hours a week.

You will be required to log on remotely to complete certain tasks, which involve high latency and is not for everyone.

TIME TRACKER IS REQUIRED

MUST HAVE HIGH-SPEED INTERNET CONNECTION and at least 16GB Of RAM on the computer. Microsoft PowerBI installed

MUST BE WILLING TO VALIDATE WORK, it is not enough to write a formula and hope for the best

Looking for an experienced data analyst
Examples of tasks:
-Create report from SQL DB or Excel files
-Finding insights drawing conclusions
-Formatting (visually appealing)
-Help Creating PowerApps
-Help creating Power Automate Flows
-Help Create Report Builder
-Creating Power Automate Workflows
-Report Builder Reports
-Set up KPI tracking in Power BI
-Writing Documentation
-Script Python

NOT LOOKING FOR A DEVELOPER THAT JUST FOLLOWS ORDERS looking for someone that can provide solutions. That can teach me not the other way around.


40% of the time is spent analyzing data. It is not enough to create a measure or show a chart must dig into the data. What is the data telling us? these fields are blank is this ok? so many nulls is this right? etc.

40% asking the right questions in order to comprehend and create the business intelligence report. being innovative and condensing disparate pieces of data into actionable insights or succinct reports for senior executives. Proficient with PowerBI, Mcode, and DAX

20 % documentation to help translate business requirements to technical requirements

-Use current and emerging Statistics, Machine Learning and Data Science methods
Innovate new analytic solutions that serve unmet customer needs
-Communicate analytical results clearly and succinctly-
-Work closely with me to make value-added analytical services available to stakeholders
-Be creative, collaborative in nature, and a self-starter

Must have:
PowerBI
SQL

Preferred
Python/ML

item.title: Bubble.io Dashboard App Buildout - Upwork
item.description:
Goal: To implement given designs and charts from a database for an analytics dashboard that enables the client to make edits and changes themself.


Overview: Edifice is a hospitality technology company that is optimizing design prototypes in hotels. We combine our unique dataset of how people use the space with hotel datasets (sales, guests, etc) to create insights to drive revenue and savings opportunities.

Previous Dashboards: We created previous dashboards using Microsoft Power BI that are a good reference to understand what we want to do in Bubble. Bubble.io was chosen for the next version of the dashboard.

Design: Client will give you design direction from designs in Figma and sketches that are similar to dashboards done in Power BI previously.

Database: We have imported initial datasets into Bubble from AWS. There will be additional datasets from the hotel that we will import later and add to the dashboard.

Tasks:

Responsible for reviewing past and current dashboard designs and discussing with client for clarifications.

Create dashboard layout and functionality shown in previous and current designs.

Use database in Bubble to create charts and the ability to filter charts based on time/date range, hotel property location, hotel property comparison, revenue, etc.

Use chart plugins for charting needs. Ability to create custom chart may be required.

Back and forth with the client to test designs, function, buttons, charts, etc.

Ability to easily create, add or remove chats with the same design style.

Initial dashboard to be set up in 3 days to show to clients customers.

Dashboard Buildout Priorities

Overall dashboard layout and pages
Add charts
Login landing page with the credentials
Admin dashboard for other users to sign and track usage.
Add hotel properties and compare property metrics

Deliverables

Fully functioning dashboard for 1 hotel property that can be replicated for additional new properties

Dashboard functionality and design meets requirements shared from discussions with client and from past and current dashboard designs

Teach client to edit, change and update the dashboard themselves to reduce back and forth.

Information and knowledge of Bubble is missing above. You are the domain expert and look to you for suggestions and better ways of creating the dashboard. Please take ownership of the project and guide the client based on goals. Thank you!

I will share designs with you when we schedule a call. I am looking to move quickly and get this up and running in 3 days. Looking forward to speaking and working with you!


Budget: $500
Posted On: July 17, 2024 20:54 UTC
Category: Full Stack Development
Skills:Amazon Web Services, Bubble.io, API, Web Application, API Integration, Web Design, UX & UI
Skills: Amazon Web Services, Bubble.io, API, Web Application, API Integration, Web Design, UX & UI
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Power BI Analyst - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description: Power BI Analyst

Position Overview: We are seeking a skilled Power BI Analyst to implement a few projects. The ideal candidate will be responsible for Building dashboards, automate reporting utilizing multiple access points/Touchpoints from mobile devices (To include MDM, Cellular data) application usability etc.  This role requires a deep understanding of business requirements, data modeling, and the ability to convert raw data into meaningful insights and reports for our customers.



Key Responsibilities:

Understand business requirements in the BI context and design data models to convert raw data into meaningful insights and reports for customers.
Create dashboards and visual interactive reports using Power BI.
Identify key performance indicators (KPIs) with clear objectives and consistently monitor them.
Analyze data and present it through reports that can help in decision-making.
Convert business requirements into technical specifications and decide the timeline to accomplish tasks.
Design, develop, and deploy Power BI scripts and perform efficient, detailed analysis.
Create a system for data on privately owned mobile devices where our apps are downloaded from the Play Stores
Create charts, visuals, pivot tables and document data with explanations of algorithms, parameters, models, and relations.
Conduct data warehouse development.
Perform SQL querying for optimal results.
Use filters and graphs for better understanding of the data.
Define and design new systems by analyzing current ETL processes.
Make technical changes to existing BI systems to enhance their functioning where necessary.
Necessary Skills:

Ability to communicate with both business and technical teams.
Strong client management skills.
Ability to learn and quickly respond to rapidly changing business environments.
Up-to-date knowledge of best practices and advancements in development and design.
Multitasking and interpersonal skills.
Documenting, designing, and modeling solutions, and explaining, representing, and discussing the same with the team.
Applying experience and knowledge to future solution considerations.
Analytical and problem-solving mindset and approach.
Continuous improvement mindset.
Self-motivated and eager to learn.
Team player, leader, and initiator.
Qualifications:

Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
Proven experience as a Power BI Analyst or in a similar role.
Proficiency in Microsoft BI technologies, including SQL and Power BI.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
Ability to handle multiple tasks and work in a fast-paced environment.
Commitment to continuous learning and improvement.
If you are passionate about data analytics and have a knack for translating business requirements into technical solutions, we would love to hear from you! Apply now to join our dynamic team and help drive business insights and decisions.

Category: Data Visualization

item.title: Power Automate, Power Apps - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description:
We are seeking an experienced Power Automate and Power Apps developer to automate our air ticket booking process. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in Microsoft Power Platform, including Power Automate, Power Apps, SharePoint, and Dataverse, and will be capable of integrating these tools with our HR application and travel company systems.

Responsibilities:
Design and develop a Power App for employees to submit air ticket booking requests.
Integrate the Power App with our HR application to validate ticket entitlements and request details.
Create and configure Power Automate flows to:
Forward booking requests to the travel company via API or email.
Receive and process travel options from the travel company.
Notify employees of available travel options and collect their selections.
Send selected travel options back to the travel company for final booking.
Handle budget constraints and class restrictions (e.g., no business class).
Notify employees and relevant staff of booking confirmations.
Ensure all workflows and data integrations are seamless and efficient.
Document the development process and provide training for our staff on using the new system.

Budget: $1,000

Category: Scripting & Automation
Skills:Microsoft PowerApps, Microsoft Power Automate
Skills: Microsoft PowerApps, Microsoft Power Automate

item.title: Jira Dashboard creating  - Upwork
item.description:
JIRA Dashboard Developer for Requirement Management

Description:

We are seeking an experienced JIRA Dashboard Developer to create a custom dashboard for our requirement management process. The goal is to improve transparency and efficiency in tracking requirements, tasks, and progress for our team.

Responsibilities:

- Design and develop a JIRA dashboard tailored to the needs of our requirement management process.
- Integrate various data sources from JIRA to create a comprehensive and interactive dashboard.
- Implement real-time updates and notifications for status changes in requirements.
- Provide a user-friendly interface for stakeholders to easily navigate and utilize the dashboard.

item.title: *Executive Sales Assistant* - Upwork
item.description:
Job Title: Sales Assistant

Job Description:

We are seeking a highly skilled and tech-savvy Sales Assistant to join our team. As a Sales Assistant, you will play a crucial role in supporting our sales operations by pulling data on customers, managing Salesforce, and organizing spreadsheets. Your expertise with CRM tools and ability to handle complex data tasks will help enhance our sales efficiency and customer management.

Key Responsibilities:

Data Management: Pull and analyze customer data to support sales strategies and campaigns.
Salesforce Management: Efficiently use Salesforce to track customer interactions, manage leads, and update records.
Spreadsheet Organization: Assist in organizing and maintaining customer data in spreadsheets, ensuring accuracy and accessibility.
Report Generation: Pull and generate detailed reports to provide insights into sales performance and customer behavior.
CRM Organization: Help organize and streamline our CRM systems, including Salesforce, HubSpot, and other tools.
Email Campaigns: Draft and execute email campaigns to engage customers and support sales initiatives.
Klaviyo Setup: Set up and manage Klaviyo for email marketing and customer segmentation.
Collaboration: Work closely with sales and marketing teams to ensure alignment and support their data and reporting needs.
Requirements:

Experience: Deep experience with Salesforce, HubSpot, and other CRM tools.

Technical Skills: Proficiency in spreadsheet software (e.g., Excel, Google Sheets) and strong data analysis skills.
Detail-Oriented: Ability to manage and organize large amounts of data with precision.
Communication: Excellent communication skills to collaborate effectively with team members.
Problem-Solving: Strong problem-solving abilities and a proactive approach to tasks.
Tech Savvy: Comfortable with technology and able to quickly adapt to new tools and software.
Preferred Qualifications:

Previous experience in a sales support or administrative role.
Familiarity with data visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI).
Understanding of sales processes and customer relationship management.
If you are a detail-oriented, tech-savvy professional with a passion for sales support and customer data management, we would love to hear from you. Apply now to join our dynamic team and contribute to our sales success!

How to Apply:
Please submit your resume and a brief cover letter detailing your experience with Salesforce, HubSpot, and other CRM tools. Include specific examples of how you have supported sales teams and managed customer data in previous roles.

Hourly Range: $5.00-$15.00

item.title: PowerBI Expert Needed for Data Prep, Data Modeling, Visualization - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description: Power BI Developer for Comprehensive Data Integration and Visualization Project
We are seeking an experienced Power BI Developer to work on a comprehensive data integration and visualization project. The project involves three key steps: data integration into an Azure SQL Database, data modeling in tabular for Power BI, and data visualization in Power BI and Paginated Report Builder.

Responsibilities:
Step 1: Data Integration into Azure SQL Database

Extract data from various sources such as on-premises databases, cloud-based databases, and flat files.
Transform the extracted data to ensure consistency and quality, applying necessary business rules and logic.
Load the transformed data into Azure SQL Database, creating a robust and scalable data repository.

Step 2: Data Modeling in Tabular for Power BI

Design a semantic data model that defines the relationships between different data entities, ensuring data integrity and accuracy.
Create calculated columns, measures, and KPIs to provide meaningful insights and support complex analytical queries.
Optimize the model for performance and scalability, ensuring quick and efficient data retrieval for end-users.

Step 3: Data Visualization in Power BI and Paginated Report Builder

Develop interactive dashboards and reports in Power BI that provide users with intuitive and actionable insights through charts, graphs, and other visual elements.
Utilize Power BI’s advanced features such as drill-downs, filters, and slicers to enhance data exploration and analysis.
Create paginated reports for detailed, print-ready reports that can be easily exported to PDF, Excel, and other formats, using the Paginated Report Builder.

Requirements:
Proven experience in data integration and ETL processes.
Proficiency in Azure SQL Database and SQL.
Strong knowledge of Power BI, including DAX and Power Query.
Experience with tabular modeling and creating calculated columns, measures, and KPIs.
Expertise in developing interactive Power BI dashboards and reports.
Familiarity with Paginated Report Builder for creating detailed reports.
Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.

Preferred Qualifications:
Experience with cloud platforms, particularly Azure.
Knowledge of data warehousing concepts and best practices.
Ability to work independently and manage multiple tasks effectively.
Strong communication skills to collaborate with stakeholders and present findings.
If you have a passion for turning data into actionable insights and have the skills required to complete this project, we would love to hear from you. Please submit your proposal along with examples of your previous work in Power BI and data integration projects.

Hourly Range: $15.00-$30.00
Posted On: July 17, 2024 16:55 UTC
Category: Data Visualization
Skills:SQL, Data Analysis Expressions, Power Query, Microsoft Power BI, Data Visualization, Data Analysis, Data Modeling, Problem Solving, Microsoft Azure SQL Database
Skills: SQL, Data Analysis Expressions, Power Query, Microsoft Power BI, Data Visualization, Data Analysis, Data Modeling, Problem Solving, Microsoft Azure SQL Database
Country: United States
